description: Returns the resource policy of the S3 Access Grants instance. You must have the s3:GetAccessGrantsInstanceResourcePolicy permission to use this operation.

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the S3 Access Grants instance.

nested_items.name: Policy
nested_items.description: The resource policy of the S3 Access Grants instance.

nested_items.name: Organization
nested_items.description: The Organization of the resource policy of the S3 Access Grants instance.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when you created the S3 Access Grants instance resource policy.
